overview: The work of Ghazanfar with his father Aqbalakhan and his brother Abbas live in their son-in-law Akbar. Every night between Abbas and Akbar on the transfer of Ashraf, sister Abbas and wife of Akbar, the pilgrimage takes place, and their tenants demand Mirza from the work of Ghazanfar.
title: Khanevade-ye sarkar Ghazanfar
